A

AbstractManipulator - Class in com.demandware.appsec.secure.manipulation
Base implementation of a Manipulator (handles both filtering and encoding).
AbstractManipulator(IManipulateOption) - Constructor for class com.demandware.appsec.secure.manipulation.AbstractManipulator
Every Manipulator must have a corresponding ManipulateOption which contains various options for sub-configuration of a Manipulator

S

SecureEncoder - Class in com.demandware.appsec.secure.manipulation
SecureEncode contains many methods for manipulating untrusted data Strings into RFC-Compliant Strings for a given context by encoding "bad" data into the proper format.
SecureEncoder() - Constructor for class com.demandware.appsec.secure.manipulation.SecureEncoder
 
SecureFilter - Class in com.demandware.appsec.secure.manipulation
SecureFilter contains many methods for manipulating untrusted data Strings into RFC-Compliant Strings for a given context by removing "bad" data from the untrusted data.
SecureFilter() - Constructor for class com.demandware.appsec.secure.manipulation.SecureFilter
 
slashEscapeChar(Character) - Static method in class com.demandware.appsec.secure.manipulation.impl.ManipulationUtils
Converts given character to it's escaped version
